description: Installs the Presonus Universal Control Software Package that contains software and drivers for first-generation StudioLive™ 24.4.2, 16.4.2, and 16.0.2 mixers and FireStudio™ Mobile, Project, Tube, and Lightpipe audio interfaces.
summary: Installs the Presonus Universal Control Software Package that contains software and drivers for first-generation StudioLive™ 24.4.2, 16.4.2, and 16.0.2 mixers and FireStudio™ Mobile, Project, Tube, and Lightpipe audio interfaces.
author: Presonus
